title: Drawing, "Lady Esther Yacht: Deck Saloon", ca. 1934–35
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite at right, center: Capehart - 500 records./60' for capeh. 43 x 14 records/Lounge - convertible/Bar./Desk group/Bookcases/Card room group./Chest for drawers./Bath. 2 showers/Closet space.; inscribed with instructions.
description: Plan of deck saloon on Lady Esther Yacht. Circular staircase on north wall at far left; Capehart radio-phonograph to right of staircase with tub chair in front. Three-seat sofa at right of Capehart, shelves at right, around partition. Bookshelves along north and east wall at far right. Card table and four chairs in front of bookshelves. Large bathroom on east wall toilet and sink near north wall, two showers at center, and closet near south wall. Bar with rounded front corners at far right on south wall. Two-seat sofa flanked by desk at left and shelves at right on south wall at far left. Two chairs in lower left corner.
